::DarkMouse::

"Blast you Suukie.  Your going to get killed."
*She ran after him and saw him collaps.  She saw Sinisis  draw up the battle 
axe.  She ran over and yelled,*

"Stop!  You can't kill him.  He's too,uh, well he's needed, umm, well anyway 
you can't kill him."

*grabs Suukie and drags him off just as fast her little rodent legs could 
go.  She dragged Suukie over by a tree and layed him down and tied to make 
him as comfortable as possable*

"Now don't move.  And don't go out there again.  I'm trying to save your 
metal hide OK.  Geez, trying to prove I'm a maximal now is going to get me 
killed."

*She croutched down by Suukie at the base of the tree with her gun at her in 
her hand*

"I'll get myself killed yet."

>Suukie got up, looked at Dark Mouse.
>
>"Thanks, but I have a job to do at the base, to save the Maximal race!"
>Suukie said. He then walked back to the Predacon base and collapsed again,
>from lack of mech fluid. Sinesis laughed, mumbling something about Suuie
>being stupid, and drawing out his battle axe...
